attributes.action: Cancel English exams in line with Scotland and Wales
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to fall in line with the other nations and assess our students instead of put them through the exams. All the added stress that covid 19 has caused is seriously affecting their mental health. These are the children of the future and their future will be ruined by stress and they will be at an unfair disadvantage to Scottish and Welsh children who have had the exam pressure removed.
attributes.background: English pupils will be competing for college and university places with Scotland and Wales so the 2021 exams need to be fair to them all.
